problem_text: (Well-known problem). Does the order (if it is greater than p2) of a finite non-cyclic p-group divide the order of its automorphism group? A. I. Starostin
answer: No, not always (J. Gonz´alez-S´anchez, A. Jaikin-Zapirain, Forum Math. Sigma, 3, Article ID e7, 11 p., electronic only (2015)).
